body_html: I'm curious whether "torch.onnx.symbolic should contain all symbolic functions, and should be self-contained i.e. have no dependencies on other torch modules" is always possible. What if it requires invoking some utility functions? Alternative is to put symbolic functions next to actual functions declarations. But then we need to make torch.onnx.utils importable everywhere.

body: I'm curious whether "torch.onnx.symbolic should contain all symbolic functions, and should be self-contained i.e. have no dependencies on other torch modules" is always possible. What if it requires invoking some utility functions? Alternative is to put symbolic functions next to actual functions declarations. But then we need to make torch.onnx.utils importable everywhere.
